This game is just awesome. I don't remember from which torrent I dl'ed it (it wasn't this one) but I can highly recommend it!

So.... I've been playing it now for a while. I completed it a few times. I won all the trophies of all the mini-games, puzzles and survivals. I got the Golden Sunflower (yeah!!). I got 13 flags on Survival Endless. My Cash is 453,800 dollars. Crazy Dave's shop has nothing more to offer and my Tree Of Wisdom is 62 feet high and has finally run out of wisdom. Is there anything more to accomplish?? I'm gonna grow my tree to a hundred feet but I fear that this won't get me anywhere :-))

Cheers!

ok, my tree is 90 feet and there seems to be a supply-shortfall on fertilizer... I completed 20 flags of survival endless, how's that? :D
btw, what's your favorite plant? For me, it's the doom shroom! You better not fuck with a doom shroom! LOL
